name: What Was Left
description:
Welcome to the first and "alpha" version of the game! What Was Left is a first person puzzle adventure where you solve riddles on a vibrant, deserted island. Every riddle you solve gives you pieces of three short stories. The game is meant to be relatively easy and relaxing, with a focus on immersing yourself in the

Controls

  • E - pick items up
  • F - place items down
  • C - zoom in (once you've obtained a special item)
  • H - toggle riddle on / off screen
  • WASD - move
  • Spacebar - jump

Important Note: there are set places where players place items down. These areas always have a bottle nearby containing a piece of a short story that can only be picked up after you place the right item.

Another important note: There will likely be many bugs but also quality of life difficulties. For example, if you're sure the item you're looking at is correct but can't pick it up, try adjusting your angle at which you are looking at it from and just spam the pickup button. Will get these fixed in the next versions!
